job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtLocation  TexasltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtRequirementsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtStrong knowledge of Python and general software development skills source code management debugging testing deployment etcltligtltligtStrong understanding of text preprocessing and normalization techniques such as tokenization and POS taggingltligtltligtAbility to design NLP pipelines to meet customer requirementsltligtltligtFamiliarity with different approaches for training entity tagging models eg CRF RNN CNN TransformerltligtltligtExperience with asynchronous programming is a plusltligtltligtFamiliarity with deep learning frameworks such as Tensorflow and Pytorch a plusltligtltligtFamiliarity with computer vision deep learning algorithms a plus CNN RCNNltligtltligtBS MS andor PhD in Mathematics Physics etcltligtltulgtltpgtInterested candidates can mail their resumes to careerkalongenscomltpgt
